Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.inputs: <inputs> <INP_EMAIL_ID class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <INP_PAUSE_WF_START class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_START> <INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR_ASYNC class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR_ASYNC> <INP_PAUSE_WF_VALIDATE_DIR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_VALIDATE_DIR> <INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR> <INP_CREATE_DIR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_CREATE_DIR> <INP_DIR1 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <INP_DIR2 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <IIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</IIIIIIIIIIII> <INP_DIR_CLIENT class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity" _list_="false"> <clientName/> <clientId/> </INP_DIR_CLIENT> <INP_PAUSE_WF_DELETE_DIR class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_DELETE_DIR> <INP_DELETE_DIR_POST_CREATION class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_DELETE_DIR_POST_CREATION> <INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR_PSEXEC class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_FILE_OPR_PSEXEC> <INP_USERNAME_CLIENT class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">localhost\Administrator</INP_USERNAME_CLIENT> <INP_PASSWORD_CLIENT class="workflow.types.EncryptedString" _list_="false"/> <IIIIIIIIIIIIIII class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</IIIIIIIIIIIIIII> <INP_TEST_SPLITLINES class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">true</INP_TEST_SPLITLINES> <INP_PAUSE_WF_SPLITLINES class="java.lang.Boolean" _list_="false">false</INP_PAUSE_WF_SPLITLINES> <INP_LINE1 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">line1 string1</INP_LINE1> <INP_LINE2 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">line2 string2</INP_LINE2> <INP_LINE3 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">line3 string3</INP_LINE3> </inputs>
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.description: Utilize fork/join activities and psExec and ExecuteCommand activities to create directories in parallel
Workflow_WorkflowDefinition.variables: <variables> <VAR_WORKFLOW_PHASE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <VAR_PAUSE_STRING class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_PAUSE_STRING> <VAR_WF_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">COMPLETED</VAR_WF_STATUS> <VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">.</VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE> <VAR_DIR_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true"/> <VAR_DIR_FAILED_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true"/> <VAR_DATE_STR class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <VAR_INP_DIR1 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <VAR_INP_DIR2 class="java.lang.String" _list_="false"/> <VAR_DIR_TO_DELETE_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true"/> <VAR_DIR_FAILED_TO_DELTE_LIST class="java.lang.String" _list_="true"/> <VAR_SPLITLINES_STATUS class="java.lang.String" _list_="false">passed</VAR_SPLITLINES_STATUS> </variables>

Activity.description: creates a super process group

Activity.description: Execute a script on a remote machine

inputs.val: <inputs> <client class="commvault.msgs.CvEntities.ClientEntity">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_client}</client> <impersonateUserName class="java.lang.String">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_username}</impersonateUserName> <impersonateUserPassword class="workflow.types.EncryptedString">xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb_password}</impersonateUserPassword> <startUpPath class="java.lang.String"/> <scriptType class="commvault.msgs.App.ScriptType">WindowsBatch</scriptType> <script class="java.lang.String">if not exist "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_directory}" ( mkdir "xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_1/pb1_directory}" exit 0 ) else ( exit 0 )</script> <arguments class="java.lang.String"/> <waitForProcessCompletion class="java.lang.Boolean">true</waitForProcessCompletion> </inputs>

Activity.description: activity to execute code snippets in the selected language
Activity.name: Script

inputs.val:
<inputs> <script language="1" script="logger.info("INFO: pb_status : [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status} + "]");
logger.info("INFO: pb_list [" + xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_list} + "]");

if (!xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_status}.equals("COMPLETED") || (xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_list} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_list}.isEmpty()))
{
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS", "FAILED");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE", xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_5/pb_failiure_message});
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_STATUS = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_STATUS") + "]");
 logger.info("INFO: Setting VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE = [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_WF_FAILIURE_MESSAGE") + "]");
}"/> </inputs>

inputs.val:
<inputs> <script language="1" script="if (xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_21/pb1_directory_list} != null && !xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_21/pb1_directory_list}.isEmpty())
{
 String[] arrList = xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_21/pb1_directory_list}.split(" ");
 workflow.setVariable("VAR_DIR_TO_DELETE_LIST",arrList);
 logger.info("INFO : VAR_DIR_TO_DELETE_LIST [" + workflow.getVariable("VAR_DIR_TO_DELETE_LIST") + "]");
} "/> </inputs>

Activity.description: executes queries against a commcell database
Activity.name: CommServDBQuery

inputs.val: <inputs> <commCell/> <query>select * from EvMsgCache where Message='[xpath:{/workflow/variables/VAR_DATE_STR}] [xpath:{/workflow/ProcessBlock_8/pb_message}]' order by evMsgId desc</query> </inputs>

condition.script: (xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/rowCount} < 1);
(xpath:{/workflow/CommServDBQuery_1/resultSets/rowCount} > 0);
